name: GreenHearts
description:
GreenHearts

A green heart represents in the game the feminist struggle against patriarchy.

The Pregnancy Voluntary Interruption law was approved in Argentina by the national congress on December 30 of 2020, after long struggles by feminist collectives.  A green heart, one of the symbols and emoji most used on the networks in Argentina as a show of empathy towards this expansion of rights search, represents in the game the feminist struggle against patriarchy.  The latter is characterized by typography, each letter must be avoided to get points, if you hit one the heart enlarges and shows the struggles that are missing, including similar laws regulation of, in almost all of Latin America.

GREEN can be played indefinitely by going beyond each of the letters that make up the word Patriarchy, whose characters sometimes overlap, group or protect themselves, forming blocks that are difficult to circumvent.
